snippet: Some watchdog groups are questioning a proposed deal that would allow Donald J. Trump to operate a planned golf course at Ferry Point Park.
abstract: Some watchdog groups are questioning proposed deal that would allow Donald J Trump to operate a golf course at Ferry Point Park in the Bronx; critics say deal, under which Trump's company would pay a fraction of the licensing and development fees a previous vendor agreed to a decade ago, is unlikely to pay for cost of project.
lead_paragraph: Some watchdog groups are questioning a proposed deal that would allow Donald J. Trump to operate a planned golf course at Ferry Point Park.

headline.seo: Plan for Trump to Run Bronx Golf Course Has Critics
headline.main: Plan for Trump to Run a Bronx Golf Course Has Critics
headline.print_headline: Proposal for Trump to Operate a Bronx Golf Course Draws Criticism Over Its Terms
